content:
# I successfully crafted 2 stone furnaces, and my inventory now reflects this change. 
# The current inventory is 2 stone furnaces and 12 units of wood, with no stone remaining. 
# This is a good start, but I need to gather more stone to continue building my factory.

# Step 3: Gather more stone
# 
# I will head back to the nearest stone resource and collect additional stone to ensure I have enough for future crafting.

move_to(nearest(Resource.Stone))  # Move to the nearest stone resource
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=10)  # Gather more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
